entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Blowing snow in open areas near noon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
